line_1: And heaven averted all his wishes spurns.
line_2: Elate with hope his generous bosom burns;

line_1: Yet, while he weeps, his soul their cold indifference spurns.
line_2: Their joyless state, even more than his who mourns

line_1: Yet, while he weeps, his soul their cold indifference spurns.
line_2: Unto his widowed heart indeed returns,
